description: Try our easy to follow Avocado & Salmon Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rolls,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Back to school,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Avocado & Salmon Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare rice vermicelli noodles following packet instructions. Drain. Roughly chop with scissors.
Dip 1 rice paper into a bowl of warm water for 20 seconds until softened. Lay on a clean board.
Arrange coriander leaves, smoked salmon slices, noodles, avocado and butter lettuce leaves across the centre. Fold sides in and roll up to enclose filling. Repeat to make 12 rolls.
Combine 1/2 cup wasabiflavoured mayonnaise and juice of 1 lime and serve with the rice paper rolls.
